subject: ARCH
title: The Development of Modern Italian Architecture (Rome)
description: The course addresses the issues of architecture and urbanism in Rome and Italy from 1750 to the present. It explores the relationship between cultural, political, and artistic phenomena such as Futurism, Novecento, and Rationalism, that anticipate and create modernism in Italy. [Note: Two one-day field trips, estimated cost $60.00. Offered:  F]
